titleStmt.title: The fountain of slaunder discovered. By William Walwyn, merchant. With some passages concerning his present imprisonment in the Tower of London. Published for satisfaction of friends and enemies.
titleStmt.author: Walwyn, William, 1600-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Hils, and are to be sold by W. Larnar, at the sign of the Blackmore, near Bishops-gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Blackmore, near Bishops-gate
